fields.name: Free battles (Battle Pass)
fields.value: A player with Battle Pass can do 30 free battles each day.

fields.name: Free battles (no Battle Pass)
fields.value: A player without Battle Pass can do 20 free battles each day.

fields.name: Additional battles
value<text>: • Each player can use gems to do up to 10 additional arena battles.
